alert.note: Alert for Stutsman (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 15 at 6:19PM CDT until further notice by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Bismarck ND has issued a Flood Warning for the Pipestem Creek near Pingree affecting Stutsman County in North Dakota... ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pipestem Creek near Pingree. * WHEN...From tonight until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, Flooding at this level affects farmland, but no major cities or roads. Water is out of the banks. Little known about damage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:15 PM CDT Saturday the stage was 10.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tonight to a crest of 11.2 feet tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 11.3 feet on 03/10/1983. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
